patterns: what are services provided for students in Tezpur University
responses: Tezpur University provides a range of services for students, including academic support,Bus Time, Health and Counseling, Hostel,Scholarships, Student organizations, Technology Support, Recreational Facilities, Diversity and inclusion programs, and international student support. For specific details, please refer to the official Tezpur University website http://www.tezu.ernet.in or contact the relevant departments.

patterns: What recreation facilities do you have?
What athletic facilities are on campus?
responses: We have excellent rec facilities including a brand new fitness center, pools, courts for basketball/volleyball/squash, playing fields, ice rink and more. Many recreational sports clubs and intramurals available too.

patterns: What courses are available in CSE?
responses: We offer various programs such as Btech, Mtech, MCA.
Our campus is located at Napaam, Tezpur, Assam 784028.
To apply, you can visit our admissions page on the website or contact the admissions office.

patterns: How can I schedule a campus visit?
responses: You can schedule a campus visit by contacting our visitor center or filling out the visit request form on our website. When would you like to visit?

patterns: How much does it cost to attend?
responses: Tuition fees vary depending on the program and whether you're an in-state or out-of-state student. Our website provides detailed information about tuition and fees for each program. Additionally, we offer various scholarships and financial aid options.

patterns: Can you provide the website link?
Where can I find more information?
responses: You can visit our college website at https://www.tezu.ernet.in/. Our website contains comprehensive information about programs, admissions, campus life, and more. Feel free to explore and find the information you need.
